item.description:
Our Maltese Meet this month will take place the SECOND Sunday of the month, July 10, because the first Sunday falls during July 4th weekend.

We will meet from 1pm to 4pm at Especially for Pets in Sudbury, again. They do have air conditioning! And it is a safe and friendly place.

Please let me know as soon as you can whether or not you can come.

Thanks!

Maltese best,
Kim

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Maltese July Meetup
